text:
e="preserve">Rex Lyall Patrick (born 8 May 1967) is an Australian politician. He has served as a Senator for South Australia since 2017. He is a member of the Centre Alliance. He was born in Whakatane, New Zealand and moved to South Australia as a child. Patrick served in the Royal Australian Navy from 1983 to 1994.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Patrick tested positive to COVID-19.
